titleStmt.title: An ordinance of pardon and grace to the people of Scotland. Wednesday 12th April, 1654. Ordered by His Highness the Lord Protector and the Council, that this ordinance bee forthwith printed and published. Hen. Scobel, Clerk of the Council.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Lord Protector (1653-1658 : O. Cromwell)
England and Wales. Council of State.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, by William Du-Gard, and Henry Hills, Printers to His Highness the Lord Protector,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
